'''Adventurer of the Shimmering Woods''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Sumeru: The Rainforest of Lore]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete a total of 40 Open World [[Time Trial Challenges]] in [[Avidya Forest]], [[Lokapala Jungle]], [[Ardravi Valley]], [[Ashavan Realm]], [[Vissudha Field]], [[Lost Nursery]], and [[Vanarana]].
